meanings.definition: Not conducive to maintaining health and cleanliness.
meanings.sent1: The dirty restroom was very unhygienic.
meanings.sent2: It is important to avoid eating food from unhygienic places.
meanings.sent3: The unhygienic kitchen was a breeding ground for germs.
meanings.sent4: Her unhygienic habits were like inviting sickness into her life.
meanings.sent5: The unhygienic conditions in the hospital were alarming.

meanings.sent1: The unhygienic pool water made everyone sick.
meanings.sent2: Living in an unhygienic environment can lead to health problems.
meanings.sent3: His unhygienic behavior at the dinner table was quite off-putting.
meanings.sent4: The unhygienic state of the public restroom was a nightmare.
meanings.sent5: The unhygienic practices in the restaurant kitchen were unacceptable.
